title: 35 White Elephant Gifts That Everyone Will Fight Over
description: This holiday tradition can be fruitful, I swear!
excerpt: I rounded up 35 white elephant gifts everyone is sure to fight over, from universally loved scents to gender-neutral clothing, home décor, and more.
text: HOSTESS WITH THE MOSTEST Georg Jensen Sky SetDelicious drinks and plentiful compliments aren’t technically included, but they might as well be. This gift is especially great for party hosts.LITTLE LUXURYChanel The Nature Getaway SetWho could ever turn down a little Chanel? Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowSTATEMENT ACCESSORY Damson Madder Scarf A statement accessory, like this cozy scarf from Damson Madder, is a must-have for elevating muted winter outfits.TABLE MANNERSBusiness & Pleasure Co. Placemats, Set of 4 No elbows on the table, please! Just these darling placemats from Business & Pleasure.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowEDITOR FAVORITEMason Pearson Handy Mixture BrushA fellow ELLE contributor put me on to Mason Pearson brushes, and now I’ll never turn back. A quality hairbrush that’ll last for decades is a fantastic gift. AT-HOME FACIAL NuFACE Mini Starter Kit Can’t afford to send them to the spa? I feel that. Instead, give this perfect handheld gadget that will leave them snatched and sculpted from the comfort of their couch.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowNEW ARRIVAL Aesop Eleos Aromatique Hand BalmWhenever Aesop drops a product, I know it’s going to be good. The new Eleos balm is ideal for keeping hands hydrated and happy during the cold months. TRAVEL PALETTEYves Saint Laurent Couture Mini Clutch Eyeshadow PaletteI was gifted this little YSL palette last Christmas, and it’s still in my constant rotation. I keep it in my purse! Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowFLAMELESS FRAGRANCE Apotheke White Vetiver Reed DiffuserGifting reed diffusers feels decidedly elevated, wouldn’t you agree? I recommend this scent from Apotheke; it’s clean, unique, and universally loved.WISHLIST ITEM Guest In Residence The Soft Socks I saw these stunning cashmere socks in-store last week and haven’t stopped thinking about them since. Nothing haunts me like the clothes I didn’t buy.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowTRANSITIONAL ITEMComme Si La Boxer AltaIt might be getting cold outside, but that doesn’t mean it’s time to put my boxers away. Take the trend from summer to winter with these simple flannel pants from Comme Si. NOT JUST ANOTHER WATER BOTTLELARQ Bottle PureVis™I can’t be separated from my water bottle long enough to clean in; I’m just too attached. This genius self-cleaning invention does it for you with the touch of a button. Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowFUNCTIONAL DECOREdie Parker Glass Tabletop LighterNot only is this chic tabletop lighter gorgeous, but it also serves a purpose for candlesticks, incense, and perhaps other things from the affectionately nicknamed brand Weedie Parker. FESTIVE DECORATIONSLenox How The Grinch Stole Christmas OrnamentsWhen in doubt, nobody can resist a good ornament set. And the only kind of Grinch I like on Christmas is a porcelain one dangling from my tree.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowELECTRONIC TOOTHBRUSH SURI Sustainable Electric ToothbrushI’ve been using this Suri toothbrush for months, and I don’t think I’ll ever go back to a regular toothbrush again. It’s minimal, sleek, and comes with a magnetic wall mount to keep it off my bathroom counter. FOR THE FOODIEBrightland The Mini Artist SeriesThis set of infused olive oils sold out four times in a row, but if you can get your hands on one, it’s the perfect gift for foodies. Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowSWEET TREAT Levain Bakery Cookie Tin BundleThere’s nothing more luxurious and decadent than a delectable sweet treat from Levain. BEAUTY ESSENTIAL Saie The Brush CollectionI love this makeup brush set from Saie because with only four brushes, it’s all I need to complete a look.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowQUALITY MATERIALSParachute Cloud Linen Gauze ThrowOrganic cotton and flax linen are the secret ingredients that make this throw blanket undeniably soft. SWEAT SESSION Bala The Play Mat PlusThe best kind of workout buddy supports you, tags along for every class, and provides stability in your toughest moments—but I’m not talking about any of your friends; I’m talking about this mat from Bala. It’s the ultimate gym partner.
html:
HOSTESS WITH THE MOSTEST

Georg Jensen Sky Set

Delicious drinks and plentiful compliments aren’t technically included, but they might as well be. This gift is especially great for party hosts.

LITTLE LUXURY

Chanel The Nature Getaway Set

Who could ever turn down a little Chanel?

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

STATEMENT ACCESSORY

Damson Madder Scarf

A statement accessory, like this cozy scarf from Damson Madder, is a must-have for elevating muted winter outfits.

TABLE MANNERS

Business & Pleasure Co. Placemats, Set of 4

No elbows on the table, please! Just these darling placemats from Business & Pleasure.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

EDITOR FAVORITE

Mason Pearson Handy Mixture Brush

A fellow ELLE contributor put me on to Mason Pearson brushes, and now I’ll never turn back. A quality hairbrush that’ll last for decades is a fantastic gift.

AT-HOME FACIAL

NuFACE Mini Starter Kit

Can’t afford to send them to the spa? I feel that. Instead, give this perfect handheld gadget that will leave them snatched and sculpted from the comfort of their couch.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

NEW ARRIVAL

Aesop Eleos Aromatique Hand Balm

Whenever Aesop drops a product, I know it’s going to be good. The new Eleos balm is ideal for keeping hands hydrated and happy during the cold months.

TRAVEL PALETTE

Yves Saint Laurent Couture Mini Clutch Eyeshadow Palette

I was gifted this little YSL palette last Christmas, and it’s still in my constant rotation. I keep it in my purse!

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

FLAMELESS FRAGRANCE

Apotheke White Vetiver Reed Diffuser

Gifting reed diffusers feels decidedly elevated, wouldn’t you agree? I recommend this scent from Apotheke; it’s clean, unique, and universally loved.

WISHLIST ITEM

Guest In Residence The Soft Socks

I saw these stunning cashmere socks in-store last week and haven’t stopped thinking about them since. Nothing haunts me like the clothes I didn’t buy.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

TRANSITIONAL ITEM

Comme Si La Boxer Alta

It might be getting cold outside, but that doesn’t mean it’s time to put my boxers away. Take the trend from summer to winter with these simple flannel pants from Comme Si.

NOT JUST ANOTHER WATER BOTTLE

LARQ Bottle PureVis™

I can’t be separated from my water bottle long enough to clean in; I’m just too attached. This genius self-cleaning invention does it for you with the touch of a button.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

FUNCTIONAL DECOR

Edie Parker Glass Tabletop Lighter

Not only is this chic tabletop lighter gorgeous, but it also serves a purpose for candlesticks, incense, and perhaps other things from the affectionately nicknamed brand Weedie Parker.

FESTIVE DECORATIONS

Lenox How The Grinch Stole Christmas Ornaments

When in doubt, nobody can resist a good ornament set. And the only kind of Grinch I like on Christmas is a porcelain one dangling from my tree.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

ELECTRONIC TOOTHBRUSH

SURI Sustainable Electric Toothbrush

I’ve been using this Suri toothbrush for months, and I don’t think I’ll ever go back to a regular toothbrush again. It’s minimal, sleek, and comes with a magnetic wall mount to keep it off my bathroom counter.

FOR THE FOODIE

Brightland The Mini Artist Series

This set of infused olive oils sold out four times in a row, but if you can get your hands on one, it’s the perfect gift for foodies.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

SWEET TREAT

Levain Bakery Cookie Tin Bundle

There’s nothing more luxurious and decadent than a delectable sweet treat from Levain.

BEAUTY ESSENTIAL

Saie The Brush Collection

I love this makeup brush set from Saie because with only four brushes, it’s all I need to complete a look.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

QUALITY MATERIALS

Parachute Cloud Linen Gauze Throw

Organic cotton and flax linen are the secret ingredients that make this throw blanket undeniably soft.

SWEAT SESSION

Bala The Play Mat Plus

The best kind of workout buddy supports you, tags along for every class, and provides stability in your toughest moments—but I’m not talking about any of your friends; I’m talking about this mat from Bala. It’s the ultimate gym partner.
